conbody.p: The Integrate Module lets an Adobe online marketing partner integrate with a mutual client’s JavaScript tracking code, providing the opportunity for bi-directional data sharing with mutual clients. Through the integrate module, partners can receive the data they need to improve the client’s service while providing additional data that increases the utility of a client’s SiteCatalyst reports.

The Integrate Module is a code framework that Adobe online marketing partners can use to create bi-directional communications between their services, the client’s Web site, and SiteCatalyst collection servers. The Integrate Module provides the following communication options:

section.title: Share SiteCatalyst Variables with Partner
section.p: The Integrate Module lets Client share SiteCatalyst variables with Partner. To do this, Partner typically provides Client with additional JavaScript code to insert into the Adobe JavaScript Web beacon ( s_code.js) that performs the following general steps:

p.b: NOTE: Client must contact Adobe to enable the Integrate Module for their report suite. Client should contact their Account Manager or ClientCare for this purpose.

ol.li: Create a partner object to facilitate communications between Partner systems and Adobe data collection servers. For more information, see "add" on page 5.

Call the Integrate Module useVars method to insert the appropriate SiteCatalyst variables into the partner object and assign them to the appropriate Partner variable (see "useVars" on page 4).You can also use the Integrate Module script method to get additional JavaScript from the Partner site that you want to execute on a Client page when specific conditions are met (see "script" on page 7).

Call the Integrate Module beacon method to send the Partner variables to the Partner system (see "beacon" on
page 6).

section.title: Include Partner Data in Adobe Data Collection
section.p: The Integrate Module lets Client incorporate data from Partner systems into SiteCatalyst data collection. To do this, Partner typically provides Client with additional JavaScript code to insert into the Adobe JavaScript Web beacon ( s_code.js) that performs the following general steps:

p.b: NOTE: Client must contact Adobe to enable the Integrate Module for their report suite. Client should contact their Account Manager or ClientCare for this purpose.

ol.li: In Client's s_code.js, load the Integrate Module.s.loadModule("Integrate")
Create a partner object to facilitate communications between Partner systems and SiteCatalyst. For more information, see "add" on page 5.

Insert the appropriate partner variables into the partner object. You can do this in the following ways:Dynamic: Use the Integrate Module get method (see "get" on page 5)Static: Assign a partner variable to the partner object. For example:s.Integrate.partner_name.cID = 12345s.Integrate.partner_name.aID = 98765
Use the Integrate Module setVars method to assign variables in the partner object to the appropriate SiteCatalyst variables (see "setVars" on page 5).
The SiteCatalyst Web beacon includes the SiteCatalyst variables with partner data when it sends data to Adobe data collection servers.
